body.name: Rolling Knife Sharpener, Knife Sharpening with Industry Diamonds and Ceramic Discs. Rolling Knife Sharpening System for Kitchen Knives, Knife Sharpener Kit with 15 & 20 Degree Sharpening.(Walnut)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Accurate and Long-Lasting Sharpness】 Any serious chef knows that high-quality knives are expensive. Use BEXYON rolling knife sharpening to keep your cutting as new and lasting for a longer time. With our easy-to-use system, anyone can obtain factory sharp knives in just a few minutes.

【Diamond and Ceramic Disc】 The grinding disc is coated with the hardest and most effective grinding stone in nature: diamond. #400 grit size can effortlessly remove the first layer of the blade while restoring sharpness. Then use the ceramic disc to make professional knives smoother and sharper.

【15°&20° Sharpening Angles】 Maintaining a constant sharpening angle is a key factor in sharpening knives. The 15 degree sharpening angle will give your fine blades made of Damascus steel or high-quality carbon steel a fine edge. the 20 degree sharpening angle is suitable for kitchen and outdoor pocket knives, providing sturdy edges and excellent sharpness.

【Premium wood & Strong magnets】 Each product is made of walnut wood from the Black Forest. The magnetic support contains four N42 super-strong magnets to keep your knife firmly attached to the base without moving.

【3-Year Warranty】 The BEXYON rolling knife sharpener kit provides a 3-year warranty, no repair, only replacement; The high-quality roller sharpener is not only suitable for professional knife sharpener tool collectors, chefs, outdoor sports enthusiasts, and other hobbyists, but also the perfect gift for your friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cut Above the Rest – The Ultimate Knife Sharpener!
reviews.reviewText: The Rolling Knife Sharpener is an outstanding kitchen tool that transforms your cooking experience. Its innovative design and ease of use make it the perfect choice for both amateur cooks and professional chefs. The combination of industry diamonds and ceramic discs ensures that your knives are sharpened to perfection with just a few strokes. Furthermore, the durability of the sharpener guarantees that it will last for years, making it an excellent investment. The safety features are top-notch, providing a secure grip and preventing any risk of injuries. Additionally, the sharpener's sleek and modern design ensures that it will look great in any kitchen. In conclusion, I highly recommend the Rolling Knife Sharpener to anyone who values precision and efficiency in their kitchen tools. It's a must-have, and you won't regret investing in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to use, the clean up is effortless, and no blade stands a chance.My only complaint is that straight away I noticed right out the package the 15○ strip was already peeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This sharpener would be suited for a Viking kings massive war axe blade. With its smooth transition from forward to back the roller glides down the blade with vengeance as it sharpens the great warriors mighty blade. Then with a quick flip the roller becomes the ultimate finishing touch to give the blade its devastating razor edge. But don’t forget the double sided magnetic block holder. It has a magnetic hold powerful enough for the mighty power of the kings decision stick. Know this, this sharpener kit is fit for a king and his rain of power to all who oppose him.It is also a great value as it would allow the king to give thanks to the gods with a golden sacrifice and still have enough bullion left over to build as many Viking ships as possible to sail across the treacherous seas and over run his enemies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, easy, and even sharpening.
reviews.reviewText: Love this sharpener! It is heavy and durable and sharpens the knife evenly and quickly all the way across. I never had one like this but this is really neat. I have used the 20° angle for larger knives and the 15° for smaller knives and it sharpens it to perfect. Neat new kitchen gadget!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Good product! It helps me sharpen my knives efficiently. With the design of this rolling part, I can use it easily without even using much force. Really smart design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works the same as the more expensive brands
reviews.reviewText: Saw this type of sharpener on he ole' Tick Tok and looked into them. The TT brand was over $100 and I didn't think that was worth it, so I looked into different brands. Found this brand and I was comfortable with the price point so gave it a go.I had a cheap knife sharpener for my kitchen knives and I think it was doing more harm than good to the knives, I could spend 15-20 min sharpening one knife and it was only marginally sharp.The first time I used this sharpener on my everyday kitchen blade I brought it back to deadly sharpness in about 3-5 min. I use this on all my blades know from the kitchen to camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and convenient!
reviews.reviewText: This knife sharpener is a game changer! Easy to use, it quickly brings dull blades back to life. A must-have for any kitchen!
